title: Samss55
author: Samss55
content: Hi there, Are you a crypto business developer or a crypto IT developer ?I'm trying to get a better understanding of the goals, needs and pains that you face when building your products and services.I'm looking for people who build products that add utility to existing  crypto tokens,  not  those creating their own tokens.if that's your case or you know someone in that situation, It would be great if I can get 20 or 30 min of your time to get your feedback. would be happy to provide UXR tips for your app/site if that helps.please PM or reply with your availabilitythank you

comments.author: sunsilk
comments.body: Move this thread on Project Development most of thread's like this are found there.But if you're going to pay someone for this that you're asking like giving tip to the inputs of the devs which will help you, then move this to the Services.If you don't know how to move, look at the left side of this thread at the most bottom part to see the 'move topic'.
